Posts.EditableText: Hello everyone here at the quest forums, just letting you know that my long-running project, heliacal hostility, will release tomorrow on the 24th, coinciding with my 21st birthday. I just wanted to stop in and thank you all for the support and help over the past months, I would not have been able to complete it without you. You're all thanked in the credits, as well. If you're interested in following it, head over to my facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/TurbonerdStudio If you could like the page, or at least take a look, I would be grateful. A little bit about the game: Its a medium-length game, by my standards, I think it would take a little over two hours to complete for a new player. it features a full soundtrack over fourty minutes in length, with an additional 75 sound effects. It has some character and environment artwork here and there as well. It has a branching story with three different endings. I hope you'll consider playing it when it releases this time tomorrow. I'm going to marathon the next twenty hours to try to iron out all the bugs to make sure what's released is a finished product. Thankyou for your time
